title: The Roadside Rescue
description: Pepper Jones just can’t help it. Even driving to work leads her into a mystery. Pulling over to help a woman acting crazy, she is immediately thrown into a life and death situation with her mysterious partner Jacob Longstreet. Racing through the woods at full speed, will they find a missing child before it’s too late?After that, a little-known classmate seeks Pepper out after discovering her grandma’s house is haunted. Pepper has never been a ghost hunter, but she finally agrees to check it out. Coming face to face with the spirit in the house is the scariest thing Pepper has ever done, but is everything really as it seems?
author: J.T. Lewis
